description:
Suspended on cords, these tiles are excellent portable training devices, allowing you to do pull-ups, lock-offs and dead hangs to stay in condition through the winter. Each hold includes a deep jug on top, a four-finger pocket, a four-finger flat edge, and a three-finger pocket.

  • Made of textured polyester resin
  • Designed to allow rotation of joints to prevent injury
  • CNC-milled, for perfect symmetry
  • Suspension holes are now run deeper for better durability
  • Sorry, no colour choice
name: Metolius Rock Rings 3D
